column4: Anyone know if the Server flavour of 7.10 automount USB flash drives?  what w ould the path to such a device be?  Trying to download non-apt packages without a GUI or browser is tricky...
wget to the direct URL, eh?
Been a while since my command line days =]
I'm not certain whether it will automount flash drives, but assuming it does, I'd guess the mount point would be either /media/mountpoint or /mnt/mountpoint, mine normally mount as /media/dsk
